metadata:
Racing+ racing+ 857628390 [h1][b]Racing+ A racing mod for The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+[/b][/h1]
Normally a single player game, the Lua mod, client, and server allow players to be able to race against each other in real time. Find out more at [url=https://isaacracing.net]the official Racing+ webpage[/url].
For questions or technical support, do not post a comment. Instead, please join the Racing+ Discord server at: https://discord.gg/JzbhWQb 0.0.223 Public
